rows.title: Fun and games

text.eng: Playing games with teens is a great way to spend quality time together while also teaching important skills.

rows.text: Playing games with teens is a great way to spend quality time together while also teaching important skills.

rows.title: Everyday activities

text.eng: Turn everyday activities into something fun! Help your teen learn by doing these everyday activities.

rows.text: Turn everyday activities into something fun! Help your teen learn by doing these everyday activities.

rows.title: Learning at home

text.eng: School is not the only place where teens learn. These activities will teach them life skills that will help them at school and beyond.

rows.text: School is not the only place where teens learn. These activities will teach them life skills that will help them at school and beyond.
